sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import './TaskItem.css' const TaskItem = ({task}) => { const status_labels = ["Не выполнено", "В работе", "Выполнено"] const [work_status, setWorkStatus] = useState(task.status) const btn_labels = ["Начать", "Завершить", "Завершено"] const btn_label = btn_labels[work_status] return (
{task.title}
{task.text}
{status_labels[task.status]}
{btn_label}
) } export default TaskItem
